title: Go Ethereum Mobile (Android)  BoundContract abi error

body:
Sorry, but i you got connect your own private network with android geth ? 

I don't get it and I see that you get it because you already are step of calling contracts.  

Can you help me with this? Type your code that connect with your private node.
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.
This has been fixed in 1.8. If the problem still occurs, reopen the issue and provide a sample smart contract so that we can reproduce it.
